channel.title: How do I change given XP?
channel.description: OK, I got Testscape, just to let all of you know. What I want to know is how can I change the amount of XP someone gets for completing something. For example, whenever someone hits a 1 on an NPC, how do I change it so they can get, like, 25 XP instead of 4?

item.title: How do I change given XP?
item.dc:creator: @The_General The General
item.description:
@The_General wrote:

Can you tell me a specific code, because when I try to put in the NPC ID, nothing happens. [br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 06:42:13 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 06:46:59 PM[/size][hr]Please, for the love of Godâ€¦ I apologize in advance for the spamming I may be doing.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change given XP?

item.title: How do I change given XP?
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Search for that NPC in Client.java (search for the ID number not the npc name) then u should see XP or 4, change the 4 to 25.

Read full topic
